root.name: Super High Impact
root.description: Super High Impact is an arcade football game that allows up to four players to play. Each player has one action button, which is used to select plays, pass, spin, power the kick meter, and so on. The game was originally designed by Midway Games and released in arcades in 1991. Acclaim ported the arcade game to the Genesis and Super Nintendo.Super High Impact is the follow-up to High Impact Football.
